item.title: Binex at ShmooCon
item.description: At ShmooCon 2020, RET2 Systems was hosting a challenge where they had prototype waterbottles held within a laser system with alarms, run off of a Raspberry Pi. The goal was to access the Raspberry Pi, disable the lasers and alarms, all within their provided Wargames environment. Provided with the disassembly, data, source, and python script to run an interactive response, you were left to your own devices to figure out a way to run
